data.name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Hunter Weapon Skin Set
data.detailed_description:
Stalk your prey with the Hunter Weapon Skin Set. These skins can be equipped in the Loadout menu on both Security and Insurgent teams for the following weapons where available:

• M110 SASS (Marksman)
• M24 (Marksman)
• Mk 14 EBR (Marksman)
• M82A1 CQ (Marksman)
• G3A3 (Rifleman)
• Mk 17 Mod 0 (Advisor)

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase. They can be equipped in-game in the Loadout menu under each weapon’s “Aesthetic” upgrade category.
data.about_the_game:
Stalk your prey with the Hunter Weapon Skin Set. These skins can be equipped in the Loadout menu on both Security and Insurgent teams for the following weapons where available:

These items are unlocked in-game immediately upon purchase. They can be equipped in-game in the Loadout menu under each weapon’s “Aesthetic” upgrade category.
data.short_description: Stalk your prey with the Hunter Weapon Skin Set. These skins can be applied to six different weapons.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Finnish, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Swedish, Czech, Thai, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 (3.10GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.50GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760/AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700 (3.20GHz)/AMD Ryzen 7 2700 (3.20GHz)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980/AMD Radeon R9 390X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD is recommended.
